Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: AtomicDEX is basically designed for mobiles first.

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: It's coded using modern language stacks like Flutter.io and Dart language

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: And the recent updates in these languages says that the same software stake built apps for mobiles can also be easily ported to desktop

Author: grewalsatinder#9653
Content: so can sure expect the same applications on Desktop sometime in future.... not sure when.
